page.title: 10JACQUELINE'S DAY, BLEASDALE
page.content: I get up at 8 o'clock,get dressed, brush my hair and have some coffee and toast.Then it is time to go outside to wait for Mrs. Kelsall to go to school in her Land Rover. We have prayers and today we had Hymn Practice.We usually do Maths and English in the morning. Everyone in this school stays for school dinner. Our dinners are cooked at a school in Garstang.We always read for 10 minutes when we come in after playtime.This afternoon we did History. We drew a picture of King Henry VIII.Last lesson was P.E.we did it in the hall.We have a playtime in the morning and in the afternoon.When I got home I played on the Atari, watched TV and had my tea.I got changed and fed my rabbit.Usually I play in the playhouse.When I go to bed I read until I fall asleep.
